This winodw asks you to confirm an action.
The checkbox at the bottom allows you to ignore this specific confirmation.
By reseting confirmations, the one ignored will appear again.

Submit
Cancel
This event makes the use win.
This event makes the use loose.
Structure start point.

The structure corresponds to the higlighted events on roll over.
By default the entry point of a structure will be the most top left event except if an event is explicitly specified as the entry point with this option.
The player will win the quest if he arrives on this event. He will then be able to evaluate your quest.
The player will loose the quest and will have to restart it from the beggining if he arrives on this event.

Quest description :
Launch this quest
Install script Kuest
Install GreaseMonkey
Install TamperMonkey
To play this quest, install GreaseMonkeyTamperMonkey as well as the script Kuest :
Help :

Here are the steps to be able to play a quest.
  • If you use Firefox, install GreaseMonkey then click on that link.
  • If you use Google Chrome, install TamperMonkey then click on that link.
    Or go to the page chrome://extensions then drag&drop the file Kuest.user.js inside the page.
  • The script hasen't been tested on Opera
  • Internet Explorer doesn't support the script.
Once installed, you only need to click on "Launch this quest" under to start the quest.
